replies.msg:
Opinium’s figures for the Observer say the Conservatives still have a 12-point lead

https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2019/nov/09/tories-poll-advantage-faltering-labour-gaining-ground?fbclid=IwAR1gfAgZCzyAPfFeHN5UH0vAaFW6IUsGr1-bgISato_H-VevTSywDq7zFSA

With the total mess of Brexit had been going on for over 3 years now. 3 prime ministers and a general elections later, the labour party can somehow find itself losing support and tailing the Tories by more than 12 points. Jeremy Corbyn refusal to back a 2nd referendum is a ridiculously stupid political suicide in slow motion.

Hong Kong people. Stand up and be honest with your true demand for autonomy and sovereignty. Show the world you have a plan to build a new Hong Kong that is prosperous and sovereign. This glorious fight of the century to bring down the CCP dictatorship to establish a prosper and independent Hong Kong state should not be diminished.

Do not be Jeremy Corbyn. Do not be a lying hypocrite.

#HongKongIndependence
